thread.title: Squeezable apple sauce recalled due to mould
thread.title_full: Squeezable apple sauce recalled due to mould

title: Squeezable apple sauce recalled due to mould
text:
Squeezable apple sauce recalled due to mould 
CBC News Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Two lots of GoGo squeeZ, advertised as apple sauce on the go, have been recalled, says the Canadian Food Inspection Agency. 
Mould has been found in lots of the apple grape and apple pear flavours, prompting the manufacturer, Materne Canada, to issue the recall. The products have been sold across the country. 
The products have best before dates between June 30 and July 26, 2016. 
There have been no illnesses associated with the recall....
